resources.string: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall. \n -Nelson Mandela
The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.\n -Walt Disney
Your time is limited, so don not waste it living someone else life. Don not be trapped by dogma â€“ which is living with the results of other people thinking. \n -Steve Jobs
If life were predictable it would cease to be life, and be without flavor. \n -Elanor Roosevelt
If you look at what you have in life, you will always have more. If you look at what you don not have in life, you will never have enough.\n -Oprah Winfrey
Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.\n -Ralph Waldo Emerson
Always remember that you are absolutely unique. Just like everyone else.\n -Margaret Mead
Don not judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant.\n -Robert Louis Stevenson
It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.\n -Aristotle
